content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a potential landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What is the price of the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The final agreed price was 850 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as an 8.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo
